newsitem.title: USA: Anheuser-Busch Cos Inc Q3 oper net rises.
newsitem.headline: Anheuser-Busch Cos Inc Q3 oper net rises.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Revenues reflect net sales. Q3 1996 gross sales before excise taxes $3.54 billion vs $3.43 billion.
Q3 1995 earnings from continuing operations and exclude $4.2 million or $0.01 a share loss from discontinued operations.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
Nine-month 1996 net sales based on gross sales of $9.73 billion vs $9.40 billion.
Nine-month 1996 income from continuing operations and excludes income of $33.8 milion, or $0.07 a share from discontinued operations.

Nine-month 1996 income, however, includes a $54.7 million, or $0.06 a share, gain from the sale in Q1 1996 of the St. Louis National Baseball Club, Busch Memorial Stadium and several nearby parking garages and other properties. Excluding that gain, nine-month 1996 income from continuing operations was $973.0 million, or $1.91 per fully diluted share.
Nine-month 1995 income from continuing operations and excludes loss of $10.6 million, or $0.02 a share, from discontinued operations.
